data.marketing-pricing-notice-room-booking: All prices are indicative and subject to applicable taxes in your country and payment method fees. At the moment, we offer services in South Korea only. If you live in another country, please contact us for a price estimate.
data.marketing-pricing-notice-payment-system: All prices are per meeting room per month before tax. If you can't see your country in the list, please contact us and we'll provide a rate.
